body:
## Release Notes

## Features

- Implement Tox network profiler @JFreegman (#1885)
- Add `to_string` functions for toxencryptsave errors. @iphydf (#2824)
- implement the address resolution network struct functions @Green-Sky (#2773)
- Add option to disable DNS lookups in toxcore. @iphydf (#2694)
- add missing connect to network struct @Green-Sky (#2774)

## Bug Fixes

- Don't crash on malloc failures in bin_unpack. @iphydf (#2834)
- Fake broadcast address for 127.x.x.x @iacore (#2760)
- Avoid `memcpy`-ing structs into onion ping id data. @iphydf (#2687)
- The logger drops frame with the "Success" status. @nickolay168 (#2765)
- Allow TCP connections to fail `connect` calls. @iphydf (#2828)
- Allow peers to reconnect to group chats using a password @JFreegman (#2807)
- reduce memory usage in group chats by 75% @Green-Sky (#2801)
- friend requests with very long messages are no longer dropped @JFreegman (#2720)
- windows use of REUSEADDR @Green-Sky (#2790)

## Documentation

- Update the docs for group join functions @JFreegman (#2808)
- Output the error code string instead of int in toxav logging @iphydf (#2812)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Move most cirrus jobs to circleci. @iphydf (#2838)
- Happy new year! @iphydf (#2822)
- Add dispatch/events headers to bazel export. @iphydf (#2814)
- Upgrade dependencies for websockify. @iphydf (#2809)
- Fix tsan build by moving it to github ci. @iphydf (#2805)
- make bazel server shutdown faster @Green-Sky (#2795)
- Use vcpkg instead of conan in the MSVC build. @iphydf (#2797)
- Migrate to conan 2. @iphydf (#2796)
- bump third_party/cmp from `2ac6bca` to `52bfcfa` @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#2793)
- Add check to ensure version numbers agree. @iphydf (#2791)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- Avoid clashing with global define `DEBUG`. @iphydf (#2836)
- Use tox memory for bin_unpack and net_strerror. @iphydf (#2833)
- Some random cleanups, mostly related to mem. @iphydf (#2831)
- Check that onion IP/Port packing worked. @iphydf (#2830)
- Use tox memory allocator in some more places. @iphydf (#2829)
- Align internal logger with external on type of source line. @iphydf (#2820)
- Add missing `#include` to sort_test.cc. @iphydf (#2827)
- Update the docs for group join functions @JFreegman (#2808)
- Reduce stack frame sizes to below 4096 bytes. @iphydf (#2823)
- Add a `TOX_HIDE_DEPRECATED` check to hide deprecated symbols. @iphydf (#2821)
- Remove redundant code for checking if group exists @JFreegman (#2811)
- Fix layering check warnings. @iphydf (#2803)
- Allocate logger using tox memory allocator. @iphydf (#2789)

## Maintenance (Dependencies)

- bump third_party/cmp from `2ac6bca` to `52bfcfa` @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#2793)

## Maintenance (Refactoring)

- Make Tox_Options own the passed proxy host and savedata. @iphydf (#2819)
- Use tox memory in group connection allocations. @iphydf (#2817)
- Use tox memory for group moderation/pack allocations. @iphydf (#2816)
- Use tox memory in group chats allocations. @iphydf (#2818)
- Use tox Memory for group allocations. @iphydf (#2815)
- Use `merge_sort` instead of `qsort` for sorting. @iphydf (#2638)
- Use tox memory allocator for temporary buffers in crypto. @iphydf (#2799)
- implement the address resolution network struct functions @Green-Sky (#2773)
- add missing connect to network struct @Green-Sky (#2774)

## Maintenance (Tests)

- Add some more asserts for I/O and alloc to succeed. @iphydf (#2835)
- Add more logging to TCP connection constructor. @iphydf (#2825)
- Fix crypto_test to initialise its plain text buffer. @iphydf (#2804)
name: v0.2.21
